GK19jaygit2u:5: meghair meduraṃ ambaraṃ vana-bhuvaḥ śyāmās tamāla-drumair naktaṃ bhīrur ayaṃ tvam eva tad imaṃ rādhe gṛhaṃ prāpaya /
GK19jaygit2u:6: itthaṃ nanda-nideśataś calitayoḥ praty-adhva-kuñja-drumaṃ rādhā-mādhavayor jayanti yamunā-kūle rahaḥ-kelayaḥ // GG_1.1 //
GK19jaygit2u:8: śrī-vāsudeva-rati-keli-kathā-sametaṃ etaṃ karoti jayadeva-kaviḥ prabandhaṃ // GG_1.2 //
GK19jaygit2u:9: yadi hari-smaraṇe sarasaṃ mano yadi vilāsa-kalāsu kutūhalaṃ /
GK19jaygit2u:11: vacaḥ pallavayaty umāpatidharaḥ sandarbha-śuddhiṃ girāṃ jānītejayadeva eva śaraṇaḥ ślāghyo durūha-druteḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:13: śṛṅgārottara-sat-prameya-racanair ācārya-govardhana-spardhī ko'pi na viśrutaḥ srutidharo dhoyī kavi-kṣmāpatiḥ // GG_1.4 //
GK19jaygit2u:16: pralaya-payodhijale dhṛtavān asi vedaṃ vihita-vahitra-caritram akhedam /
GK19jaygit2u:17: keśava dhṛta-mīna-śarīra jaya jagadīśa hare [dhruva-padam] // GG_1.5 // (1.1)
GK19jaygit2u:18: kṣitir ativipulatare tava tiṣṭhati pṛṣṭhe dharaṇī-dharaṇa-kiṇa-cakra-gariṣṭhe /
GK19jaygit2u:19: keśava dhṛta-kacchapa-rūpa jaya jagadīśa hare // GG_1.6 // (1.2)
GK19jaygit2u:20: vasati daśana-śikhare dharaṇī tava lagnā śaśini kalaṅka-kaleva nimagnā /
GK19jaygit2u:21: keśava dhṛta-sūkara-rūpa jaya jagadīśa hare // GG_1.7 // (1.3)
GK19jaygit2u:23: keśava dhṛta-nara-hari-rūpa jaya jagad-īśa hare // GG_1.8 // (1.4)
GK19jaygit2u:25: keśava dhṛta-vāmana-rupa jaya jagad-īśa hare // GG_1.9 // (1.5)
GK19jaygit2u:26: kṣatrīya-rudhira-maye jagad apagata-pāpaṃ snapayasi payasi śamita-bhava-tāpam /
GK19jaygit2u:27: keśava dhṛta-bhṛgu-pati-rūpa jaya jagad-īśa hare // GG_1.10 // (1.6)
GK19jaygit2u:28: vitarasi dikṣu raṇe dik-pati-kamanīyaṃ daśa-mukha-mauli-bali ramaṇīyam /
GK19jaygit2u:29: keśava dhṛta-rāma-śarīra jaya jagad-īśa hare // GG_1.11 // (1.7)
GK19jaygit2u:31: vahasi vapuṣi viśade vasanaṃ jaladābhaṃ hala-hati-bhīti-milita-yamunābham /
GK19jaygit2u:32: keśava dhṛta-hala-dhara-rūpa jaya jagad-īśa hare // GG_1.12 // (1.8)
GK19jaygit2u:33: nindasi yajña-vidher ahaha śruti-jātam sadaya-hṛdaya darśita-paśu-ghātam /
GK19jaygit2u:34: keśava dhṛta-buddha-śarīra jaya jagad-īśa hare // GG_1.13 // (1.9)
GK19jaygit2u:35: mleccha-nivaha-nidhane kalayasi karavālaṃ dhūma-ketum iva kim api karālam /
GK19jaygit2u:36: keśava dhṛta-kalki-śarīra jaya jagad-īśa hare // GG_1.14 // (10)
GK19jaygit2u:37: śrī-jayadeva-kaver idam uditam udāraṃ śṛṇu sukhadaṃ śubhadaṃ bhava-sāram /
GK19jaygit2u:38: keśava dhṛta-daśa-vidha-rūpa jaya jagad-īśa hare // GG_1.15 // (11) * * * * *
GK19jaygit2u:39: vedān uddharate jaganti vahate bhūgolam udbibhrate daityaṃ dārayate baliṃ chalayate kṣatra-kṣayaṃ kurvate /
GK19jaygit2u:40: paulastyaṃ jayate halaṃ kalayate kāruṇyam ātanvate mlecchān mūrcchayate daśākṛti-kṛte kṛṣṇāya tubhyaṃ namaḥ // GG_1.16 // (5)
GK19jaygit2u:81: vyaktānurāgam iva khelad-anaṅga-kheda-svedāmbu-pūram anupūrayatu priyaṃ vaḥ // GG_1.26 //
GK19jaygit2u:82: vasante vāsantī-kusuma-sukumārair avayavair bhramantīṃ kāntāre bahu-vihita-kṛṣṇānusaraṇām /
GK19jaygit2u:83: amandaṃ kandarpa-jvara-janita-cintākulatayā valad-bādhāṃ rādhāṃ sarasam idam ūce sahacarī // GG_1.27 //
GK19jaygit2u:90: nṛtyati yuvatī-janena samaṃ sakhi virahi-janasya durante //dhr//
GK19jaygit2u:108: iha hi dahati cetaḥ ketakī-gandha-bandhuḥ prasarad-asama-bāṇa-prāṇavad gandhavāhaḥ // GG_1.36 //
GK19jaygit2u:112: nīyante pathikaiḥ kathaṃ katham api dhyānāvadhāna-kṣaṇa prāpta-prāṇa-samāgama-rasollāsair amī vāsarāḥ // GG_1.37 //
GK19jaygit2u:114: murārim ārād upadarśayanty asau sakhī samakṣaṃ punar āha rādhikām // GG_1.38 //
GK19jaygit2u:119: harir iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilāsati kelī-pare //dhr//
GK19jaygit2u:124: kāpi kapola-tale militā lapituṃ kim api śruti-mūle /
GK19jaygit2u:125: cāru cucumba nitambavatī dayitaṃ pulakair anukūle // GG_1.42 //
GK19jaygit2u:129: rāsa-rase saha-nṛtya-parā hariṇā yuvatī praśaśaṃse // GG_1.44 //
GK19jaygit2u:130: śliṣyati kām api cumbati kām api kām api ramayati rāmām /
GK19jaygit2u:131: paśyati sa smita-cāru-tarām aparām anugacchati vāmām // GG_1.45 //
GK19jaygit2u:133: vṛndāvana-vipine lalitaṃ vitanotu śubhāni yaśasyam // GG_1.46 //
GK19jaygit2u:135: viśveṣām anurañjanena janayann ānandam indīvara-śreṇī-śyāmala-komalair upanayann aṅgair anaṅgotsavam /
GK19jaygit2u:136: svacchandaṃ vraja-sundarībhir abhitaḥ praty-aṅgam āliṅgitaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ sakhi mūrtimān iva madhau mugdho hariḥ krīḍati // GG_1.47 //
GK19jaygit2u:139: kiṃ ca snigdha-rasāla-mauli-mukulāny ālokya harṣodayād unmīlanti kuhūḥ kuhūr iti kalottālāḥ pikānāṃ giraḥ // GG_1.48 //
GK19jaygit2u:141: rāsollāsa-bhareṇa vibhrama-bhṛtām ābhīra-vāma-bhruvām abhyarṇaṃ parirabhya nirbharam uraḥ premāndhayā rādhayā /
GK19jaygit2u:142: sādhu tvad-vadanaṃ sudhā-mayam iti vyāhṛtya gīta-stuti-vyājād udbhaṭa-cumbitaḥ smita-manohāri hariḥ pātu vaḥ // GG_1.49 //
GK19jaygit2u:144: // iti śrī-gīta-govinde sāmoda-dāmodaro nāma prathamaḥ sargaḥ // (2)
GK19jaygit2u:147: viharati vane rādhā sādhāraṇa-praṇaye harau vigalita-nijotkarṣād īrṣyā-vaśena gatā'nyataḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:148: kvacid api latā-kuñje guñjan-madhu-vrata-maṇḍalī mukhara-śikhare līna dīnāpy uvāca rahaḥ sakhīm // GG_2.1 //
GK19jaygit2u:153: rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsaṃ smarati mano mama kṛta-parihāsam // dhru. // GG_2.2 //
GK19jaygit2u:165: mām api kim api tarala-taraṅgad-anaṅga-dṛśā manasā ramayantam // GG_2.8 //
GK19jaygit2u:167: hari-caraṇa-smaraṇaṃ prati samprati puṇyavatām anurūpam // GG_2.9 // * * * * *
GK19jaygit2u:168: gaṇayati guṇa-grāmaṃ bhāmaṃ bhrāmād api nehate vahati ca paritoṣaṃ doṣaṃ vimuñcati dūrataḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:170: yuvatiṣu valat-tṛṣṇe kṛṣṇe vihāriṇi māṃ vinā punar api mano vāmaṃ kāmaṃ karoti karomi kim // GG_2.10 //
GK19jaygit2u:173: nibhṛta-nikuñja-gṛhaṃ gatayā niśi rahasi nilīya vasantam /
GK19jaygit2u:192: mām udvīkṣya vilajjitaṃ smṛta-sudhā-mugdhānana-kānane govindaṃ vraja-sundarī-gaṇa-vṛtaṃ paśyāmi hṛṣyāmi ca // GG_2.19 //
GK19jaygit2u:194: api bhrāmyad-bhṛṅgī-raṇita-ramaṇīyā na mukula-prasūtiś cūtānāṃ sakhi śikhariṇīyaṃ sukhayati // GG_2.20 //
GK19jaygit2u:196: gopīnāṃ nibhṛtaṃ nirīkṣya gamitākāṅkṣaś ciraṃ cintayann antar mugdha-manoharaṃ haratu vaḥ kleśaṃ navaḥ keśavaḥ // GG_2.21 //
GK19jaygit2u:203: rādhām ādhāya hṛdaye tatyāja vraja-sundarīḥ // GG_3.1 //
GK19jaygit2u:204: itas tatas tām anusṛtya rādhikām anaṅga-bāṇa-vraṇa-khinna-mānasaḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:205: kṛtānutāpaḥ sa kalinda-nandinī-taṭānta-kuñje viṣasāda mādhavaḥ // GG_3.2 //
GK19jaygit2u:208: mām iyaṃ calitā vilokya vṛtaṃ vadhū-nicayena /
GK19jaygit2u:210: hari hari hatādaratayā gatā sā kupiteva //
GK19jaygit2u:212: kiṃ kariṣyati kiṃ vadiṣyati sā ciraṃ viraheṇa /
GK19jaygit2u:213: kiṃ dhanena janena kiṃ mama jīvitena gṛheṇa // GG_3.4 //
GK19jaygit2u:216: tām ahaṃ hṛdi saṅgatām aniśaṃ bhṛśaṃ ramayāmi /
GK19jaygit2u:217: kiṃ vane'nusarāmi tām iha kiṃ vṛthā vilapāmi // GG_3.6 //
GK19jaygit2u:219: tan na vedmi kuto gatāsi na tena te'nunayāmi // GG_3.7 //
GK19jaygit2u:220: dṛśyase purato gatāgatam eva me vidadhāsi /
GK19jaygit2u:221: kiṃ pureva sasambhramaṃ parirambhaṇaṃ na dadāsi // GG_3.8 //
GK19jaygit2u:222: kṣamyatām aparaṃ kadāpi tavedṛśaṃ na karomi /
GK19jaygit2u:223: dehi sundari darśanaṃ mama manmathena dunomi // GG_3.9 //
GK19jaygit2u:227: hṛdi bisa-latā-hāro nāyaṃ bhujaṅgama-nāyakaḥ kuvalaya-dala-śreṇī kaṇṭhe na sā garala-dyutiḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:228: malayaja-rajo nedaṃ bhasma priyā-rahite mayi prahara na hara-bhrāntyā'naṅga krudhā kim u dhāvasi // GG_3.11 //
GK19jaygit2u:229: pāṇau mā kuru cūta-sāyakam amuṃ mā cāpam āropaya kṛīḍā-nirjita-viśva mūrcchita-janāghātena kiṃ pauruṣam /
GK19jaygit2u:230: tasyā eva mṛgī-dṛśo manasija preṇkhat-katākṣāśuga-śreṇī-jarjaritaṃ manāg api mano nādyāpi sandhukṣate // GG_3.12 //
GK19jaygit2u:231: bhrū-pallavaṃ dhanur apāṅga-taraṇgitāni bāṇā guṇaḥ śravaṇa-pālir iti smareṇa /
GK19jaygit2u:232: tasyām anaṅga-jaya-jaṅgama-devatāyām astrāṇi nirjita-jaganti kim arpitāni // GG_3.13 //
GK19jaygit2u:233: bhrū-cāpe nihitaḥ kaṭākṣa-viśikho nirmātu marma-vyathāṃ śyāmātmā kuṭilaḥ karotu kabarī-bhāro'pi mārodyamam /
GK19jaygit2u:234: mohaṃ tāvad ayaṃ ca tanvi tanutāṃ bimba-dharo rāgavān sad-vṛttaḥ stana-maṇḍalas tava kathaṃ prāṇair mama krīḍati // GG_3.14 //
GK19jaygit2u:235: tāni sparśa-sukhāni te ca taralāḥ snigdhā dṛśor vibhramās tad-vaktrāmbuja-saurabhaṃ sa ca sudhā-syandi girāṃ vakrimā /
GK19jaygit2u:236: sa bimbādhara-mādhurīti viṣayāsaṅge'pi cen mānasaṃ tasyāṃ lagna-samādhi hanta viraha-vyādhiḥ kathaṃ vardhate // GG_3.15 //
GK19jaygit2u:239: saṃmugdhe madhusūdanasya madhure rādhā-mukhendau sudhā-sāre kandalitāś ciraṃ dadatu vaḥ kṣemaṃ kaṭākṣormayaḥ // GG_3.16 //
GK19jaygit2u:248: nindati candanam indu-kiraṇam anu vindati khedam adhīram /
GK19jaygit2u:249: vyāla-nilaya-milanena garalam iva kalayati malaya-samīram // GG_4.2 //
GK19jaygit2u:250: mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayād iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā /
GK19jaygit2u:256: vratam iva tava parirambha-sukhāya karoti kusuma-śayanīyam // GG_4.4 //
GK19jaygit2u:260: praṇamati makaram adho vinidhāya kare ca śaraṃ nava-cūtam // GG_4.6 //
GK19jaygit2u:261: dhyāna-layena puraḥ parikalpya bhavantam atīva durāpam /
GK19jaygit2u:262: vilapati hasati viṣīdati roditi cañcati muñcati tāpam // GG_4.7 //
GK19jaygit2u:263: prati-padam idam api nigadati mādhava tava caraṇe patitāham /
GK19jaygit2u:264: tvayi vimukhe mayi sapadi sudhā-nidhir api tanute tanu-dāham // GG_4.8 //
GK19jaygit2u:265: śrī-jayadeva-bhaṇitam idam adhikaṃ yadi manasā naṭaṇīyam /
GK19jaygit2u:267: āvāso vipināyate priya-sakhī-mālāpi jālāyate tāpo'pi śvasitena dāva-dahana-jvāla-kalāpāyate /
GK19jaygit2u:268: sāpi tvad-viraheṇa hanta hariṇī-rūpāyate hā kathaṃ kandarpo'pi yamāyate viracayan śārdūla-vikrīḍitam // GG_4.10 //
GK19jaygit2u:272: sa manute kṛśā-tanur iva bhāram // GG_4.11 //
GK19jaygit2u:275: paśyati viṣam iva vapuṣi sa-śaṅkam // GG_4.12 //
GK19jaygit2u:284: harir iti harir iti japati sa-kāmam /
GK19jaygit2u:288: sā romāñcati śītkaroti vilapaty utkampate tāmyati dhyāyaty udbhramati pramīlati pataty udyāti mūrcchaty api /
GK19jaygit2u:289: etāvaty atanu-jvare vara-tanur jīven na kiṃ te rasāt svar-vaidya-pratima prasīdasi yadi tyakto'nyathā hastakaḥ // GG_4.19 //
GK19jaygit2u:291: nivṛtta-bādhāṃ kuruṣe na rādhām upendra-vajrād api dāruṇo'si // GG_4.20 //
GK19jaygit2u:292: kandarpa-jvara-saṃjvarātura-tanor aścaryam asyāś ciraṃ cetaś candana-candramaḥ-kamalinī-cintāsu santāmyati /
GK19jaygit2u:293: kintu klānti-vaśena śītala-tanuṃ tvām ekam eva priyaṃ dhyāyantī rahasi sthitā katham api kṣīṇā kṣaṇaṃ prāṇiti // GG_4.21 //
GK19jaygit2u:294: kṣaṇam api virahaḥ purā na sehe nayana-nimīlana-khinnayā yayā te /
GK19jaygit2u:295: śvasiti katham asau rasāla-śākhāṃ cira-viraheṇa vilokya puṣpitāgram // GG_4.22 //
GK19jaygit2u:296: vṛṣṭi-vyākula-gokula-vana-rasād uddhṛtya govardhanaṃ bibhrad ballava-vallabhābhir adhikānandāc ciraṃ cumbitaḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:297: darpeṇeva tad-arpitādhara-taṭī-sindūra-mudrāṅkito bāhur gopa-tanos tanotu bhavatāṃ śreyāṃsi kaṃsa-dviṣaḥ // GG_4.23 //
GK19jaygit2u:302: aham iha nivasāmi yāhi rādhām anunaya mad-vacanena cānayethāḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:303: iti madhu-rīpuṇā sakhī niyuktā svayam idam etya punar jagāda rādhām // GG_5.1 //
GK19jaygit2u:313: manasi kalita-virahe niśi nisi rujam upayāti // GG_5.4 //
GK19jaygit2u:315: luṭhati dharaṇi-śayane bahu vilapati tava nāma // GG_5.5 //
GK19jaygit2u:317: manasi rabhasa-vibhave harir udayatu sukṛtena // GG_5.6 // * * * * *
GK19jaygit2u:318: pūrvaṃ yatra samaṃ tvayā rati-pater āsāditāḥ siddhayas tasminn eva nikuñja-manmatha-mahā-tīrthe punar mādhavaḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:319: dhyāyaṃs tvām aniśaṃ japann api tavaivālāpa-mantrāvaliṃ bhūyas tvat-kuca-kumbha-nirbhara-parīrambhāmṛtaṃ vāñchati // GG_5.7 //
GK19jaygit2u:323: na kuru nitambini gamana-vilambanam anusara taṃ hṛdayeśam // GG_5.8 //
GK19jaygit2u:326: NOTE: {This line does not seem to be in all versions. Prabodhananda does not comment on it.}
GK19jaygit2u:328: bahu manute'tanu te tanu-saṅgata-pavana-calitam api reṇum // GG_5.9 //
GK19jaygit2u:330: racayati śayanaṃ sacakita-nayanaṃ paśyati tava panthānam // GG_5.10 //
GK19jaygit2u:331: mukharam adhīraṃ tyaja mañjīraṃ ripum iva keli-sulolam /
GK19jaygit2u:332: cala sakhi kuñjaṃ satimira-puñjaṃ śīlaya nīla-nicolam // GG_5.11 //
GK19jaygit2u:333: urasi murārer upahita-hāre ghana iva tarala-balāke /
GK19jaygit2u:334: taḍid iva pīte rati-viparīte rājasi sukṛta-vipāke // GG_5.12 //
GK19jaygit2u:336: kiśalaya-śayane paṅkaja-nayane nidhim iva harṣa-nidhānam // GG_5.13 //
GK19jaygit2u:337: harir abhimāṇī rajanir idānīm iyam api yāti virāmam /
GK19jaygit2u:338: kuru mama vacanaṃ satvara-racanaṃ pūraya madhu-ripu-kāmam // GG_5.14 //
GK19jaygit2u:340: pramudita-hṛdayaṃ harim atisadayaṃ namata sukṛta-kamanīyaṃ // GG_5.15 // * * * * *
GK19jaygit2u:341: vikirati muhuḥ śvāsān āśāḥ puro muhur īkṣate praviśati muhuḥ kuñjaṃ gūñjan muhur bahu tāmyati /
GK19jaygit2u:342: racayati muhuḥ śayyāṃ paryākulaṃ muhur īkṣate madana-kadana-klāntaḥ kānte priyas tava vartate // GG_5.16 //
GK19jaygit2u:343: tvad-vāmyena samaṃ samagram adhunā tigmāṃśur astaṃ gato govindasya manorathena ca samaṃ prāptaṃ tamaḥ sāndratām /
GK19jaygit2u:344: kokānāṃ karuṇa-svanena sadṛśī dīrgha-mad-abhyarthanā tan mugdhe viphalaṃ vilambanam asau ramyo'bhisāra-kṣaṇaḥ // GG_5.17 //
GK19jaygit2u:345: āśleṣād anu cumbanād anu nakho-lekhād anu svāntaja-prodbodhād anu sambhramād anu ratārambhād anu prītayoḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:346: anyārthaṃ gatayor bhramān militayoḥ sambhāṣaṇair jānator dampatyor iha ko na ko na tamasi vrīḍā-vimiśro rasaḥ // GG_5.18 //
GK19jaygit2u:347: sa-bhaya-cakitaṃ vinyasyantīṃ dṛśaṃ timire pathi pratitaru muhuḥ sthitvā mandaṃ padāni vitanvatīm /
GK19jaygit2u:348: katham api rahaḥ prāptām aṅgair anaṅga-taraṇgibhiḥ sumukhi subhagaḥ paśyan sa tvām upaitu kṛtārthatām // GG_5.19 //
GK19jaygit2u:350: svacchandaṃ vraja-sundarī-jana-manas-toṣa-pradoṣodayaḥ kaṃsa-dhvaṃsana-dhūma-ketur avatu tvāṃ devakī-nandanaḥ // GG_5.20 //
GK19jaygit2u:356: atha tāṃ gantum aśaktāṃ ciram anuraktāṃ latā-gṛhe dṛṣṭvā /
GK19jaygit2u:357: tac-caritaṃ govinde manasija-mande sakhī prāha // GG_6.1 //
GK19jaygit2u:362: nātha hare sīdati rādhā vāsa-gṛhe // dhru. //
GK19jaygit2u:366: jīvati param iha tava rati-kalayā // GG_6.4 //
GK19jaygit2u:370: harir iti vadati sakhīm anuvāram // GG_6.6 //
GK19jaygit2u:372: harir upagata iti timiram analpam // GG_6.7 //
GK19jaygit2u:378: tava kitava vidhāyāmanda-kandarpa-cintāṃ rasa-jala-nidhi-magnā dhyāna-lagnā mṛgakṣī // GG_6.10 //
GK19jaygit2u:379: aṅgeṣv ābharaṇaṃ karoti bahuśaḥ patre'pi sañcāriṇī prāptaṃ tvāṃ pariśaṅkate vitanute śayyāṃ ciraṃ dhyāyati /
GK19jaygit2u:380: ity ākalpa-vikalpa-talpa-racanā-saṅkalpa-līlā-śata-vyāsaktāpi vinā tvayā vara-tanur naiṣā niśāṃ neṣyati // GG_6.11 //
GK19jaygit2u:381: kiṃ viśrāmyasi kṛṣṇa-bhogi-bhavane bhāṇḍīra-bhūmī-ruhi bhrātar yāsi na dṛṣṭi-gocaram itaḥ sānanda-nandāspadam /
GK19jaygit2u:382: rādhāyā vacanaṃ tad adhvaga-mukhān nandāntike gopato govindasya jayanti sāyam atithi-prāśastya-garbhā giraḥ // GG_6.12 //
GK19jaygit2u:389: vṛndāvanāntaram adīpayad aṃśu-jālair dik-sundarī-vadana-candana-bindur induḥ // GG_7.1 //
GK19jaygit2u:390: prasarati śaśa-dhara-bimbe vihita-vilambe ca mādhave vidhurā /
GK19jaygit2u:395: kathita-samaye'pi harir ahaha na yayau vanam /
GK19jaygit2u:396: mama viphalam idam amala-rūpam api yauvanam // GG_7.3 //
GK19jaygit2u:397: yāmi he kam iha śaraṇaṃ sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //dhruva////
GK19jaygit2u:399: tena mama hṛdayam idam asama-śara-kīlitam // GG_7.4 //
GK19jaygit2u:400: mama maraṇam eva varam iti vitatha-ketanā /
GK19jaygit2u:403: kim iha viṣahāmi virahānalam acetanā // GG_7.5 //
GK19jaygit2u:409: srag api hṛdi hanti mām ativiṣama-śilayā // GG_7.8 //
GK19jaygit2u:411: smarati madhusūdano mām api na cetasā // GG_7.9 //
GK19jaygit2u:413: vasatu hṛdi yuvatir iva komala-kalāvatī // GG_7.10 // * * * * *
GK19jaygit2u:414: tat kiṃ kām api kāminīm abhisṛtaḥ kiṃ vā kalā-kelibhir baddho bandhubhir andhakāriṇi vanābhyarṇe kim udbhrāmyati /
GK19jaygit2u:415: kāntaḥ klānta-manā manāg api pathi prasthātum evākṣamaḥ saṅketī-kṛta-mañju-vāñjula-latā-kuñje'pi yan nāgataḥ // GG_7.11 //
GK19jaygit2u:416: athāgatāṃ mādhavam antareṇa sakhīm iyaṃ vīkṣya viṣāda-mūkām /
GK19jaygit2u:417: viśaṅkamānā ramitaṃ kayāpi janārdanaṃ dṛṣṭavad etad āha // GG_7.12 //
GK19jaygit2u:439: vidhur atīva tanoti mano-bhuvaḥ suhṛd aye hṛdaye madana-vyathām // GG_7.21 //
GK19jaygit2u:443: mṛga-mada-tilakaṃ likhati sapulakaṃ mṛgam iva rajanī-kare // GG_7.22 //
GK19jaygit2u:454: bahir-apavaraṇaṃ yāvaka-bharaṇaṃ janayati hṛdi yojite // GG_7.27 //
GK19jaygit2u:455: ramayati subhṛśaṃ kam api sudṛśaṃ khala-haladhara-sodare /
GK19jaygit2u:456: kim aphalam avasaṃ ciram iha virasaṃ vada sakhi viṭapodare // GG_7.28 //
GK19jaygit2u:458: kali-yuga-caritaṃ na vasatu duritaṃ kavi-nṛpa-jayadevake // GG_7.29 //
GK19jaygit2u:460: nāyātaḥ sakhi nirdayo yadi śaṭhas tvaṃ dūti kiṃ dūyase svacchandaṃ bahu-vallabhaḥ sa ramate kiṃ tatra te dūṣaṇam /
GK19jaygit2u:461: paśyādya priya-saṅgamāya dayitasyākṛṣyamāṇaṃ guṇair utkaṇṭhārti-bharād iva sphuṭad idaṃ cetaḥ svayam yāsyati // GG_7.30 //
GK19jaygit2u:475: dalati na sā hṛdi cira-viraheṇa // GG_7.35 //
GK19jaygit2u:480: vahati na sā rujam atikaruṇena // GG_7.37 //
GK19jaygit2u:482: praviśatu harir api hṛdayam anena // GG_7.38 // * * * * *
GK19jaygit2u:483: mano-bhavānandana candanānila prasīda re dakṣiṇa muñca vāmatām /
GK19jaygit2u:484: kṣaṇaṃ jagat-prāṇa nidāya mādhavaṃ puro mama prāṇa-haro bhaviṣyasi // GG_7.39 //
GK19jaygit2u:486: ripur iva sakhi-saṃvāso'yaṃ śikhīva himānilo viṣam iva sudhā-raśmir yasmin dunoti mano-gate /
GK19jaygit2u:487: hṛdayam adaye tasmin naivaṃ punar valate balāt kuvalaya-dṛśāṃ vāmaḥ kāmo nikāma-niraṇkuśaḥ // GG_7.40 //
GK19jaygit2u:488: bādhāṃ vidhehi malayānila pañca-bāṇa prāṇān gṛhāṇa na gṛhaṃ punar āśrayiṣye /
GK19jaygit2u:489: kiṃ te kṛtānta-bhagini kṣamayā taraṅgair aṅgāni siñca mama śāmyatu deha-dāhaḥ // GG_7.41 //
GK19jaygit2u:490: prātar nīla-nicolam acyutam uraḥ saṃvīta-pītāṃśukaṃ rādhāyāś cakitaṃ vilokya hasati svairaṃ sakhi-maṇḍale /
GK19jaygit2u:491: vrīḍā-cañcalam añcalaṃ nayanayor ādhāya rādhānane svādu-smera-mukho'yam astu jagad-ānandāya nandātmajaḥ // GG_7.42 //
GK19jaygit2u:497: atha katham api yāminīṃ vinīya smara-śara-jarjaritāpi sā prabhāte /
GK19jaygit2u:498: anunaya-vacanaṃ vadantam agre praṇatam api priyaṃ āha sābhyasūyam // GG_8.1 //
GK19jaygit2u:502: vahati nayanam anurāgam iva sphuṭam udita-rasābhiniveśam // GG_8.2 //
GK19jaygit2u:503: hari hari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam /
GK19jaygit2u:504: tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam // dhru. //
GK19jaygit2u:506: daśana-vasanam aruṇ aṃ tava krsṇa tanoti tanor anurūpam // GG_8.3 //
GK19jaygit2u:511: daśana-padaṃ bhavad-adhara-gataṃ mama janayati cetasi khedam /
GK19jaygit2u:512: kathayati katham adhunāpi mayā saha tava vapur etad abhedam // GG_8.6 //
GK19jaygit2u:513: bahir iva malinataraṃ tava kṛṣṇa mano'pi bhaviṣyati nūnam /
GK19jaygit2u:514: katham atha vañcayase janam anugatam asama-śara-jvara-dūnam // GG_8.7 //
GK19jaygit2u:515: bhramati bhavān abalā-kavalāya vaneṣu kim atra vicitram /
GK19jaygit2u:518: śṛṇuta sudhā-madhuraṃ vibudhā vibudhālayato'pi durāpam // GG_8.9 // * * * * *
GK19jaygit2u:519: tavedaṃ paśyantyāḥ prasarad-anurāgaṃ bahir iva priyā-pādālakta-cchuritam aruṇa-cchāya-hṛdayam /
GK19jaygit2u:521: mamādya prakhyāta-praṇaya-bhara-bhaṅgena kitava tvad-ālokaḥ śokād api kim api lajjāṃ janayati // GG_8.10 //
GK19jaygit2u:525: dṛpyad-dānava-dūyamāna-diviṣad-durvāra-duḥkhāpadāṃ bhraṃśaḥ kaṃsa-ripor vyapohayatu vaḥ śreyāṃsi vaṃśī-ravaḥ // GG_8.11 //
GK19jaygit2u:533: anucintita-hari-caritāṃ kalahāntaritām uvāca rahasi sakhī // GG_9.1 //
GK19jaygit2u:537: kim aparam adhika-sukhaṃ sakhi bhavane // GG_9.2 //
GK19jaygit2u:538: mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //
GK19jaygit2u:542: kati na kathitam idam anupadam aciram /
GK19jaygit2u:552: kim iti karoṣi hṛdayam atividhuram // GG_9.8 //
GK19jaygit2u:555: snigdhe yat paruṣāsi praṇamati stabdhāsi yad rāgiṇi dveṣa-sthāsi yad unmukhe vimukhatāṃ yātāsi tasmin priye /
GK19jaygit2u:556: tad yuktaṃ viparīta-kāriṇi tava śrīkhaṇḍa-carcā viṣaṃ śītāṃśus tapano himaṃ hutavahaḥ krīḍā-mudo yātanāḥ // GG_9.10 //
GK19jaygit2u:558: svacchandaṃ makaranda-sundara-galan-mandākinī-meduraṃ śrī-govinda-padāravindam aśubha-skandāya vandāmahe // GG_9.11 // (10)
GK19jaygit2u:562: savrīḍam īkṣita-sakhī-vadanāṃ dinānte sānanda-gadgada-padaṃ harir ity uvaca // GG_10.1 //
GK19jaygit2u:565: vadasi yadi kiñcid api danta-ruci-kaumudī harati dara-timiram atighoram /
GK19jaygit2u:566: sphurad-adhara-sīdhave tava vadana-candramā rocayatu locana-cakoraṃ // GG_10.2 //
GK19jaygit2u:567: priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānaṃ /
GK19jaygit2u:571: satyam evāsi yadi sudati mayi kopinī dehi khara-nakhara-śara-ghātam /
GK19jaygit2u:572: ghaṭaya bhuja-bandhanaṃ janaya rada-khaṇḍanaṃ yena vā bhavati sukha-jātaṃ // GG_10.3 //
GK19jaygit2u:573: tvam asi mama bhūṣaṇaṃ tvam asi mama jīvanaṃ tvam asi mama bhava-jaladhi-ratnam /
GK19jaygit2u:574: bhavatu bhavatīha mayi satatam anurodhinī tatra mama hṛdayam atiyatnaṃ // GG_10.4 //
GK19jaygit2u:575: nīla-nalinābham api tanvi tava locanaṃ dhārayati kokanada-rūpaṃ /
GK19jaygit2u:576: kusuma-śara-bāṇa-bhāvena yadi rañjayasi kṛṣṇam idam etad-anurūpam // GG_10.5 //
GK19jaygit2u:577: sphuratu kuca-kumbhayor upari maṇi-mañjarī rañjayatu tava hṛdaya-deśam /
GK19jaygit2u:578: rasatu raśanāpi tava ghana-jaghana-maṇḍale ghoṣayatu manmatha-nideśam // GG_10.6 //
GK19jaygit2u:580: bhaṇa masṛṇa-vāṇi karavāṇi caraṇa-dvayaṃ sarasa-lasad-alaktaka-rāgam // GG_10.7 //
GK19jaygit2u:581: smara-garala-khaṇḍanaṃ mama śirasi maṇḍanaṃ dehi pada-pallavam udāram /
GK19jaygit2u:583: jvalati mayi dāruṇo madana-kadanāruṇo haratu tad-upāhita-vikāram // GG_10.8 //
GK19jaygit2u:584: iti caṭula-cāṭu-paṭu-cāru mura-vairiṇo rādhikām adhi vacana-jātam /
GK19jaygit2u:588: parihara kṛtātaṅke śaṅkāṃ tvayā satataṃ ghana-stana-jaghanayākrānte svānte parānavakāśinī /
GK19jaygit2u:589: viśati vitanor anyo dhanyo na ko'pi mamāntaraṃ praṇayini parīrambhārambhe vidhehi vidheyatām // GG_10.10 //
GK19jaygit2u:591: caṇḍi tvam eva mudam udvaha pañca-bāṇa-cāṇḍāla-kāṇḍa-dalanād asavaḥ prayāntu // GG_10.11 //
GK19jaygit2u:595: vyathayati vṛthā maunaṃ tanvi prapañcaya pañcamaṃ taruṇi madhurālāpais tāpaṃ vinodaya dṛṣṭibhiḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:596: sumukhi vimukhī-bhāvaṃ tāvad vimuñca na muñca māṃ svayam atiśaya-snigdho mugdhe priyo'yam upasthitaḥ // GG_10.13 //
GK19jaygit2u:597: bandhūka-dyuti-bāndhavo'yam adharaḥ snigdho madhūka-cchavir gaṇḍaś caṇḍi cakāsti nīla-nalina-śrī-mocanaṃ locanam /
GK19jaygit2u:598: nāsābhyeti tila-prasūna-padavīṃ kundābha-danti priye prāyas tvan-mukha-sevayā vijayate viśvaṃ sa puṣpāyudhaḥ // GG_10.14 //
GK19jaygit2u:600: dṛśau tava madālase vadanam indu-sandīpanaṃ gatir jana-manoramā vijita-rambhaṃ ūru-dvayam /
GK19jaygit2u:602: ratis tava kalāvatī rucira-citra-lekhe bhruvāv aho vibudha-yauvataṃ vahasi tanvi pṛthvī-gatā // GG_10.15 //
GK19jaygit2u:603: sa prītiṃ tanutāṃ hariḥ kuvalayāpīḍena sārdhaṃ raṇe rādhā-pīna-payodhara-smaraṇa-kṛt-kumbhena sambhedavān /
GK19jaygit2u:605: yatra svidyati mīlati kṣaṇam api kṣipraṃ tad-ālokana-vyāmohena jitaṃ jitaṃ jitam abhūt kaṃsasya kolāhalaḥ // GG_10.16 //
GK19jaygit2u:606: NOTE: {yatra svidyati mīlati kṣaṇam atha kṣipte dvipe tat-kṣaṇāt kaṃsasyālam abhūj jitaṃ jitaṃ jitam iti vyāmoha-kolāhalaḥ //
GK19jaygit2u:612: suciram anunayena prīṇayitvā mṛgākṣīṃ gatavati kṛtaveśe keśave kuñja-śayyām /
GK19jaygit2u:613: racita-rucira-bhūṣāṃ dṛṣṭi-moṣe pradoṣe sphurati niravasādāṃ kāpi rādhāṃ jagāda // GG_11.1 //
GK19jaygit2u:627: preraṇam iva karabhoru karoti gatiṃ prati muñca vilambam // GG_11.5 //
GK19jaygit2u:630: adhigatam akhila-sakhībhir idaṃ tava vapur api rati-raṇa-sajjam /
GK19jaygit2u:631: caṇḍi rasita-raśanā-rava-ḍiṇḍimam abhisara sarasam alajjam // GG_11.7 //
GK19jaygit2u:633: cala valaya-kvaṇitair avabodhaya harim api nija-gati-śīlaṃ // GG_11.8 //
GK19jaygit2u:637: sā māṃ drakṣyati vakṣyati smara-kathāṃ praty-aṅgam āliṅganaiḥ prītiṃ yāsyati raṃsyate sakhi samāgatyeti cintākulaḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:639: sa tvāṃ paśyati vepate pulakayaty ānandati svidyati pratyudgacchati mūrcchati sthira-tamah-puñje nikuñje prīyaḥ // GG_11.10 //
GK19jaygit2u:640: akṣṇor nikṣipad añjanaṃ śravaṇayos tāpiñcha-gucchāvalīṃ mūrdhni śyāma-saroja-dāma kucayoḥ kastūrikā-patrakam /
GK19jaygit2u:641: dhūrtānām abhisāra-sambhrama-jūṣāṃ viṣvaṅ-nikuñje sakhi dhvāntaṃ nīla-nicola-cāru sudṛśāṃ praty-aṅgam aliṅgati // GG_11.11 //
GK19jaygit2u:644: etat tamāla-dala-nīlatamaṃ tamisraṃ tat-prema-hema-nikaṣopalatāṃ tanoti // GG_11.12 //
GK19jaygit2u:647: dvāre nikuñja-nilayasya hariṃ nirīkṣya vrīḍāvatīm atha sakhīṃ īyam ity uvaca // GG_11.13 //
GK19jaygit2u:655: ḥpraviśa rādheḥ ity-ādi dhruva-padaṃ pratiślokasya prathama-dvitīya-caraṇayor madhye gīyate.}
GK19jaygit2u:666: NOTE: {vilasa rati-valita-lalita-gīte iti haridāsa-pāṭhaḥ. tatra pāthāntare rasa-valita- iti ca. }
GK19jaygit2u:677: tvāṃ cittena ciraṃ vahann ayam atiśrānto bhṛśaṃ tāpitaḥ kandarpeṇa ca pātum icchati sudhā-sambādha-bimbādharam /
GK19jaygit2u:678: asyāṅkaṃ tad alaṅkuru kṣaṇam iha bhrū-kṣepa-lakṣmī-lava-krīte dāsa ivopasevita-padāmbhoje kutaḥ sambhramaḥ // GG_11.22 //
GK19jaygit2u:688: hāram amalatara-tāram urasi dadhataṃ parilambya vidūram /
GK19jaygit2u:702: praṇamata hṛdi vinidhāya hariṃ suciraṃ sukṛtodaya-sāram // GG_11.31 // * * * * *
GK19jaygit2u:705: idānīṃ rādhāyāḥ priyatama-samāloka-samaye papāta svedāmbu-prasara iva harṣāśru-nikaraḥ // GG_11.32 //
GK19jaygit2u:707: bhajantyās talpāntaṃ kṛta-kapaṭa-kaṇḍūti-pihita-smitaṃ yāte gehād bahir avahitālī-parijane /
GK19jaygit2u:708: priyāsyaṃ paśyantyāḥ smara-paravaśākūta-subhagaṃ salajjā lajjāpi vyagamad iva dūraṃ mṛga-dṛśaḥ // GG_11.33 //
GK19jaygit2u:709: sānandaṃ nanda-sūnur diśatu mitaparaṃ saṃmadaṃ manda-mandaṃ rādhām ādhāya bāhvor vivaram anu drḍhaṃ pīḍayan prīti-yogāt /
GK19jaygit2u:711: tuṅgau tasyā urojāv atanu-varatanor nirgatau mā sma bhūtāṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ nirbhidya tasmād bahir iti valita-grīvam ālokayan vaḥ // GG_11.34 //
GK19jaygit2u:712: jaya-śrī-vinyastair mahita iva mandāra-kusumaiḥ svayaṃ sindūreṇa dvipa-raṇa-mudā mudrita iva /
GK19jaygit2u:713: bhujāpīḍa-krīḍā-hata-kuvalayāpīḍa-kariṇaḥ prakīrṇāsṛg-bindur jayati bhuja-daṇḍo murajitaḥ // GG_11.35 //
GK19jaygit2u:714: saundaryaika-nidher anaṅga-lalanā-lāvaṇya-līlā-juṣo rādhāyā hṛdi palvale manasija-krīḍaika-raṅga-sthale /
GK19jaygit2u:716: ramyoroja-saroja-khelana-rasitvād ātmanaḥ khyāpayan dhyātur mānasa-rāja-haṃsa-nibhatāṃ deyān mukundo mudam // GG_11.36 // (12)
GK19jaygit2u:720: sarasa-manasaṃ dṛṣṭvā rādhāṃ muhur nava-pallava-prasava-śayane nikṣiptākṣīm uvāca hariḥ priyām // GG_12.1 //
GK19jaygit2u:724: tava pada-pallava-vairi-parābhavam idam anubhavatu suveśaṃ // GG_12.2 //
GK19jaygit2u:725: kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike // dhruva //
GK19jaygit2u:726: kara-kamalena karomi caraṇam aham āgamitāsi vidūram /
GK19jaygit2u:727: kṣaṇam upakuru śayanopari mām iva nūpuram anugati-śūram // GG_12.3 //
GK19jaygit2u:728: vadana-sudhā-nidhi-galitam amṛtam iva racaya vacanam anukūlam /
GK19jaygit2u:729: viraham ivāpanayāmi payodhara-rodhakam urasi dukūlaṃ // GG_12.4 //
GK19jaygit2u:731: mad-urasi kuca-kalaśaṃ viniveśaya śoṣaya manasija-tāpam // GG_12.5 //
GK19jaygit2u:732: adhara-sudhā-rasam upanaya bhāmini jīvaya mṛtam iva dāsam /
GK19jaygit2u:735: śruti-yugale pika-ruta-vikale mama śamaya cirād avasādam // GG_12.7 //
GK19jaygit2u:737: lajjitam iva nayanaṃ tava viramati visṛja vṛthā rati-khedam // GG_12.8 //
GK19jaygit2u:739: NOTE: {mīlitaṃ lajjitam iva nayanaṃ tava virama visṛja rati-khedam iti tu haridāsa-dāsasya pāṭhaḥ.}
GK19jaygit2u:742: pratyūhaḥ pulakāṅkureṇa niviḍa-leśa-nimeṣeṇa ca krīḍākūta-vilokite'dhara-sudhā-pāne kathā-kelibhiḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:744: ānandādhigamena manmatha-kalā-yuddhe'pi yasminn abhūd udbhūtaḥ sa tayor babhūva suratārambhaḥ priyambhāvukaḥ // GG_12.10 //
GK19jaygit2u:745: dorbhyāṃ saṃyamitaḥ payodhara-bhareṇāpīḍitaḥ pāṇijair āviddho daśanaiḥ kṣatādhara-puṭaḥ śroṇī-taṭenāhataḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:746: hastenānamitaḥ kace'dhara-madhu-syandena saṃmohitaḥ kāntaḥ kām api tṛptim āpa tad aho kāmasya vāmā gatiḥ // GG_12.11 //
GK19jaygit2u:747: mārāṅke rati-keli-saṅkula-raṇārambhe tayā sāhasa-prāyaṃ kānta-jayāya kiṃcid upari prārambhi yat-sambhramāt /
GK19jaygit2u:749: niṣpandā jaghana-sthalī śithilitā dor-vallir utkampitaṃ vakṣo mīlitam akṣi pauruṣa-rasaḥ strīṇāṃ kutaḥ sidhyati // GG_12.12 //
GK19jaygit2u:750: tasyāḥ pāṭala-pāṇijāṅkitam uro nidrā-kaṣāye dṛśau nirdhautādhara-śonimā vilulita-srasta-srajo mūrdha-jaḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:753: kāñcī-dāma dara-ślathāñcalam iti prātar nikhātair dṛśor ebhiḥ kāma-śarais tad adbhutam abhūt patyur manaḥ kīlitaṃ // GG_12.13 //
GK19jaygit2u:754: vyālolaḥ keśa-pāśas taralitam alakaiḥ sveda-mokṣau kapolau kliṣṭā bimbādhara-śrīḥ kuca-kalaśa-rucā hāritā hāra-yaṣṭiḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:758: kāñcī-kāntir hatāśā stana-jaghana-padaṃ pāṇinācchādya sadyaḥ paśyantī satrapā sā tad api vilulitā mugdha-kantir dhinoti // GG_12.14 //
GK19jaygit2u:764: śānta-stabdha-payodharaṃ bhṛśa-pariṣvaṅgāt kuraṅgī-dṛśo harṣotkarṣa-vimukta-niḥsaha-tanor dhanyo dhayaty ānanaṃ // GG_12.15 //
GK19jaygit2u:766: atha sahasā suprītaṃ suratānte sā nitānta-khinnāṅgi /
GK19jaygit2u:768: rādhā jagāda sādaram idam ānandena govindam // GG_12.16 //
GK19jaygit2u:779: bhramara-cayaṃ racayantam upari ruciraṃ suciraṃ mama sammukhe /
GK19jaygit2u:780: jita-kamale vimale parikarmaya narma-janakam alakaṃ mukhe // GG_12.20 //
GK19jaygit2u:783: mama rucire cikure kuru mānada manasija-dhvaja-cāmare /
GK19jaygit2u:787: śrī-jayadeva-vacasi rucire sadayaṃ hṛdayaṃ kuru maṇḍane /
GK19jaygit2u:789: racaya kucayoś citraṃ patraṃ kuruṣva kapolayor ghaṭaya jaghane kāñcīṃ mugdha-srajā kavarī-bharaṃ /
GK19jaygit2u:792: kalaya valaya-śreṇīṃ pāṇau pade maṇi-nūpurāv iti nigaditaḥ prītaḥ pitāmbaro'pi tathākarot // GG_12.25 //
GK19jaygit2u:794: pādāmbho-ruha-dhāri-vāridhi-sutām akṣṇāṃ didṛkṣuḥ śataiḥ kāya-vyūham iva-carann apacitau bhūyo hariḥ pātu vaḥ // GG_12.26 //
GK19jaygit2u:796: tvām aprāpya mayi svayaṃvara-parāṃ kṣīroda-tīrodare śaṅke sundari kālakūṭam apiban mūḍho mṛḍānī-patiḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:797: itthaṃ pūrva-kathābhir anya-manasā vikṣipya vakṣo'ñcalaṃ rādhāyāḥ stana-korakopari-milan-netro hariḥ pātu vaḥ // GG_12.27 //
GK19jaygit2u:799: yad gāndharva-kalāsu kauśalam anudhyānaṃ ca yad vaiṣṇavaṃ yac chṛṅgāra-viveka-tattva-racanā-kāvyeṣu līlāyitam /
GK19jaygit2u:800: tat sarvaṃ jayadeva-paṇḍita-kaveḥ kṛṣṇaika-tānātmanaḥ sānandāḥ pariśodhayantu sudhiyaḥ śrī-gīta-govindataḥ // GG_12.28 //
GK19jaygit2u:801: NOTE: {This verse appears as number 26 in the Haridāsa edition.}
GK19jaygit2u:802: sādhūnāṃ svata eva saṃmatir iha syād eva bhaktyārthinām ālocya grathana-śramaṃ ca vidusām asmin bhaved ādaraḥ /
GK19jaygit2u:803: ye kecit para-kṛty-upaśruti-parās tān arthaye mat-kṛtiṃ bhūyo vīkṣya vadanto avadyam iha cet sā vāsanā sthāsyati // GG_12.29 //
GK19jaygit2u:807: NOTE: {This verse is the last in some editions. }
GK19jaygit2u:808: sādhvī mādhvīka cintā na bhavati bhavataḥ śarkare karkaśāsi drākṣe drakṣyanti ke tvām amṛta mṛtam asi kṣīra nīraṃ rasaste /
GK19jaygit2u:809: mākanda kranda kāntādhara dhara na tulāṃ gaccha yacchanti bhāvaṃ yāvac chṛṅgāra-sāraṃ śubham iva jayadevasya vaidagdhya-vācaḥ // GG_12.31 //
GK19jaygit2u:810: NOTE: {This verse is not found in Narayana Maharaja's edition of Gīta-govinda,
GK19jaygit2u:811: even though there is a Bāla-bodhinī ṭīkā for it.}
GK19jaygit2u:812: itthaṃ keli-tatir vihṛtya yamunā-kūle samaṃ rādhayā tad-romāvali-mauktikāvali-yuge veṇī-bhramaṃ bibhrati /
GK19jaygit2u:813: tatrāhlādi-kuca-prayāga-phalayor lipsāvator hastayor vyāpārāḥ puruṣottamasya dadatu sphītāṃ mudaṃ sampadaṃ // GG_12.32 //
GK19jaygit2u:814: NOTE: {This verse does not seem to be in those editions that follow Bāla-bodhinī. It's in the Kulkarni and Nirnaya-sāgara editions.}
